CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( State_Id_Drivers_License__c ) ,'', IF( NOT( ISBLANK( License_Document_Id__c ) ) , HYPERLINK("/" & License_Document_Id__c,'View file','_self')& ' ' ,'Upload file' & ' ') & HYPERLINK('/lightning/cmp/c__filePreviewCmp?c__recordId='& Id & '&c__fileType=License' ,IMAGE('/resource/UploadIcon','Upload',20,20) ,'_self'))
CustomField.label: License Document
